name: Sample Custom Question Bank
part1Questions: Do you prefer watching movies at home or in a cinema?
How often do you use social media?
What kind of music do you enjoy listening to?
Do you like cooking? Why or why not?
What do you usually do on weekends?
Do you prefer hot or cold weather?
What was your favorite subject in school?

part2CueCard.title: Describe a memorable event in your life
prompts: Why it was memorable to you

part3Questions: How do you think technology has changed the way people celebrate events?
Do you think modern celebrations are better than traditional ones?
What role do family gatherings play in your culture?
How important is it to preserve cultural traditions?
Do you think people spend too much money on celebrations?
